reviewtext: The clarity is so clear. I thought there would be something wrong with the picture, but there was no vertical rolling, no color bleeding, and no dark spots. The colors were soooo vivid, I thought I was watching the actual show. Of course in a recorder material, the picture quality was worse than that of seeing it right infront of you. There was only like a 0.000001% quality degrading. You won't even recognize it. It is like HDTV.
